name: Katha
description:
In recent years Mythological Creatures have come out of hiding and decided to reside with humans in modern times. Explore the city and interact with your neighbors to collect mementos to put in your journal. 

Best played on a Windows Gamepad
  
Keyboard controls
Movement------------------W,A,S,D 
Journal_open--------------I       
Journal_TabSwitch---------U,O     
EquipItem/Switch(InGame)--U,O     
UseItem(InGame)-----------R       
ExitWindowPrompts--------ESC/SPACE
Interact------------------E
